text: What is your data classification and sensitivity level?
help_text: e.g., public, internal, confidential, restricted/top secret
example_answer: PII, payment data classified as restricted

text: What encryption standards will you use for data at rest?
example_answer: AES-256 encryption for all data at rest

text: What encryption standards will you use for data in transit?
example_answer: TLS 1.3 for all external and internal communications

text: What authentication mechanism will you implement?
help_text: e.g., OAuth 2.0, SAML, JWT, MFA, passwordless
example_answer: OAuth 2.0 with optional MFA, SAML for enterprise

text: What is your password policy and management strategy?
help_text: e.g., minimum length, complexity, expiration, salted hashing
example_answer: bcrypt for hashing, 12+ char, 90-day rotation for admin

text: What access control model will you use?
help_text: e.g., RBAC, ABAC, ACL, PBAC, principle of least privilege
example_answer: RBAC with principle of least privilege

text: What is your audit logging and monitoring strategy?
help_text: e.g., immutable logs, SIEM, anomaly detection, alerting
example_answer: Immutable audit logs in separate system, real-time SIEM analysis

text: What vulnerability management and patching strategy will you use?
help_text: e.g., automated scanning, penetration testing, SLA for patching
example_answer: Monthly pen tests, critical patches within 24h

text: What is your incident response and breach notification plan?
help_text: e.g., response team, procedures, notification timelines

text: What compliance frameworks do you need to meet?
help_text: e.g., GDPR, HIPAA, PCI-DSS, SOC 2, ISO 27001
example_answer: GDPR, SOC 2 Type II, PCI-DSS for payments

text: What is your data residency and privacy requirement?
help_text: e.g., GDPR region restrictions, data sovereignty, regional storage
example_answer: EU data must stay in EU, GDPR compliant

text: What is your supply chain security and third-party risk management?
help_text: e.g., vendor assessment, security standards, SLAs
example_answer: All vendors must maintain SOC 2 certification

text: What is your security testing and code review process?
help_text: e.g., SAST, DAST, code review, security champions
example_answer: Mandatory code review, SAST in pipeline, quarterly DAST

text: What is your security training and awareness program?
help_text: e.g., annual training, phishing simulations, security champions
example_answer: Monthly security training, quarterly phishing tests
